verses.2: “Levi mite lak panin Kohath mite amauʼ innkuankuan le a behbehin,
verses.3: kikhopna buk sungah na a sem thei ding kum sawm thum pan kum sawm nga a pha mi khempeuh sim in.
verses.4: Kikhopna buk sungah Kohath mite in a siangtho pen nate tawh kisai nasepte sem ding uh hi.
verses.5: “Giahphual a kisuan ding ciangin Aaron le a tapate tumin kidalna puan la khia ding uh a, tua puan tawh thuciamna singkuang tun ding uh hi.
verses.6: Tua ciangin amaute in savun tawh tuam ding uh a, tua tungah puan a dum tawh khuhin, a zawlte bulh ding uh hi.
verses.7: “Ompihna Anlum sabuai tungah amaute in puan a dum phah ding uh a, tua tungah a kuangdaite, paknamtui pakante, kuang-ukte le tuibuahna thawl gongbakte koih ding uh a, a kikoih tawntung anlum zong a tungah om ding hi.
verses.8: Tua ciangin amaute in a ausan puan tawh tuate khuh ding uh a, savun tawh khuh thuahin, a zawlte bulh ding uh hi.
verses.9: “Mei vakna mei khuam pen, a meivakte, a taitehte, a kuangte le sathau piakna nazatte khempeuh tawh puan a dum khatin tun ding uh hi.
verses.10: Amaute in a nazat khempeuh savun-in tunin a puak nading tal tungah koih ding uh hi.
verses.11: “Puan a dum khat tawh kham biakna tau khuh ding uh a, savun tawh tua mah tuam thuahin, a zawlte bulh ding uh hi.
verses.12: Amaute in biakbuk sungah a kizang nazat khempeuh la-in puan dum khat tawh tunin, savun tawh tuate tun thuah ding uh a, a puak nading tal tungah koih ding uh hi.
verses.13: Amaute in a biakna tau panin a vutte luak khia ding uh a, a tungah puan a dupsan khat phah ding uh hi.
verses.14: Tua lai ah nasep nadinga a kizang, biakna tau nazat khempeuh, a vutluahna peek, a tu-ka, a kawbia le a kuang, biakna tau nazat khempeuh, a tungah koihin, tua tungah savun tawh tuam ding uh a, a zawlte bulh ding uh hi.
verses.15: Aaron le a tapate in biakbuk le biakbuk nazat khempeuh a tun khit uh giahphual a kisuan ciangin, tuate a pua dingin Kohath mite hong pai ding uh a, ahih hangin amaute in a siangtho nate lawng kha lo ding uh hi; lawng le-uh si ding uh hi. Hihte pen Kohath miteʼ puak ding kikhopna buk nate ahi hi.
verses.16: “Siampi Aaronʼ tapa Eleazar in meivak tui, a namtui paknamtui, a kikoih tawntung an tawh biakna, nilh sathau le biakbuk le a sunga om khempeuh le a nazat khempeuh uk ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.17: Topa in Moses le Aaron kiangah,
verses.18: “Levi mite lakah Kohath minamte a sih loh nadingin hih un.
verses.19: A siangtho pen nate nai ah amaute a pai ciangun si loin a hin nadingun hih un. Aaron le a tapate pai-in a nasep ding uh le a van puak ding ciat uh ah amaute seh ding uh hi.
verses.20: Ahih hangin a siangtho nate tom kha no sung bek nangawn a en dingin amaute tum lo ding uh hi; tum le-uh si ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.22: “Gershon mite zong, amauʼ innkuankuan le a behbehin sim in.
verses.23: Kikhopna buk sungah na a sem thei ding kum sawm thum pan kum sawm nga a pha mi khempeuh na sim ding hi.
verses.24: Nasep le van puak ciangin Gershon-te behʼ nasep dingte:
verses.25: Biakbuk dalna puante, kikhopna buk a tuamna tawh, a tungzang a om a khuhna tuu vun, kikhopna buk kongkhak-a puankhai,
verses.26: buktual a puan kikhaite, biakbuk le biakna tau kimkot ah a om buktual kongpi puankhaite, a khaute le amauʼ nasep nadinga nazat khempeuh pua ding uh a, amaute in tuate tawh a kizom nasep kisam khempeuh sem ding uh hi.
verses.27: Gershon beh pasalteʼ nasep ding, a puak ding le a hih dingte khempeuh uh Aaron le a tapateʼ thupiakna bang hi dinga, a puak ding khempeuh uh amaute na ap ding uh hi.
verses.28: Hih pen kikhopna buk sungah Gershon beh pasalteʼ nasep hi a, amauʼ nasepna pen siampi Aaronʼ tapa Ithamarʼ ukna nuai hi ding hi.
verses.29: “Merari mite zong amauʼ innkuankuan le a behbehin,
verses.30: kikhopna buk sungah na a sem thei ding kum sawm thum pan kum sawm nga a pha mi khempeuh na sim ding hi.
verses.31: Kikhopna buk sungah amauʼ sep dingte in: Biakbuk khuampeekte, a zawlte, a khuampite, khuam bullente tawh,
verses.32: a kimkot a om buktual a khuampite a bullente tawh, khetphimte, a khaute, a nazatte khempeuh le a nengnengte hi a, amauteʼ puak dingin a kiseh nate a minin na lo ding hi.
verses.33: Hih pen siampi Aaronʼ tapa Ithamarʼ khutnuai ah Merari mite in kikhopna buk sungah a sep ding teng uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.
verses.34: Topaʼ thupiakna bangin Moses le Aaron le mihonteʼ makaite in Levi mite sung panin beh thumte - Kohath-te beh, Gershon-te beh le Merari-te beh sunga om pasal mi phazah sim uh hi. Kikhopna buk sungah na a sem thei ding kum sawm thum pan kum sawm nga a pha a behbehin a nuai-a bang ahi hi: Kohath mi pasal a beh tangun tul nih le za sagih le sawm nga a pha hi. Gershon mi pasal a beh tangun tul nih le za guk le sawm thum a pha hi. Merari mi pasal a beh tangun tul thum le za nih ahi hi. Moses le Aaron le Israel makaite in a sim, Levi mi a kisim peuhmah, van puak nasep le kikhopna buk sungah na a sem thei ding kum sawm thum pan kum sawm nga a pha, a vekpi-in tul giat le za nga le sawm giat a pha hi.
verses.35: Mosesʼ tungtawnin Topaʼ thupiakna bangin a sep ding a puak ding ciat uh kiseh a, Topaʼ thupiak bangin Moses in amaute a sim hi.
